channel.title: Whats wrong with this code?

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @piiwii piiwii
item.description:
@piiwii wrote:

whats wrong with this…

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 100000000);
addItem(550, 1);
addItem(1856,1);
addItem(392,100000);
sendMessage(“The starter packet for soulscape Players !”);
starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack !”);
}
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“kickall”) && (playerRights >= 3)) {
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{ // master by piiwii
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);

addSkillXP(14000000, 23);
addSkillXP(14000000, 24);
sendMessage(“Your A Master!”);

}
if(command.equalsignorecase(“Range”))
{

teleportToX = 2658;

}

if(command.equalsignorecase(“santa”))
{
addItem(1050,1);
}

if(command.equalsignorecase(“runes”))
{
